system.effect:
By inlaying a common amulet with gemstones etched with magic glyphs you create an enchanted amulet that stores the knowledge of casting certain spells/invocations. 
When creating a magic amulet, a character must spend the required STA for each spell/invocation cast. If a spell/invocation has an active duration, the caster must also spend enough STA to sustain it for 4 rounds.
When creating an amulet, the caster may not use a magical focus. 
Every spell/invocation to be imbued in the amulet must be cast quickly in succession, without taking any other action in-between, otherwise the Crafting process fails.
